44M.F.summary: Mermaid Maritime Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, provides subsea and drilling services to the offshore oil and gas industries in Saudi Arabia, Qatar, Thailand, Indonesia, Malaysia, and internationally. The company operates through two segments, Subsea Group and Holding. It provides subsea services, including inspection, repair and maintenance, infrastructure installation support, remotely operated vehicle (ROV) support, and cable and flexible pipe laying services through operating 7 subsea vessels, 17 saturation and air diving systems, and 13 ROV systems. The company also offers offshore drilling and accommodation rig services through its ownership in 1 tender assist drilling rig, 1 accommodation barge, and 3 high specification premium jack-up drilling rigs. In addition, it engages in the provision of hydrographic survey and positioning services; diving, ROV, and subsea contracting services; and production and exploration drilling services, as well as in the offshore transportation, installation, and decommissioning business. The company was founded in 1983 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. Mermaid Maritime Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Thoresen Thai Agencies Public Company Limited.

4QVA.F.long_name: Siamgas and Petrochemicals Public Company Limited
4QVA.F.summary: Siamgas and Petrochemicals Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, trades in liquefied petroleum gas (LPG) and petrochemical products in Thailand and internationally. The company operates through Petroleum and Petrochemical Products, Transportation Services, and Other segments. It is also involved in the trading of petroleum for household cooking, industry, and transportation sectors. In addition, the company provides transportation services by land and ship; manufactures and distributes LPG cylinders; and offers warehousing and storage, and oil depots and port services. The company was formerly known as VSPP Development Company Limited. Siamgas and Petrochemicals Public Company Limited was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

4QVB.SG.long_name: Siamgas and Petrochemicals Public Company Limited
4QVB.SG.summary: Siamgas and Petrochemicals Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, trades in liquefied petroleum gas (LPG) and petrochemical products in Thailand and internationally. The company operates through Petroleum and Petrochemical Products, Transportation Services, and Other segments. It is also involved in the trading of petroleum for household cooking, industry, and transportation sectors. In addition, the company provides transportation services by land and ship; manufactures and distributes LPG cylinders; and offers warehousing and storage, and oil depots and port services. The company was formerly known as VSPP Development Company Limited. Siamgas and Petrochemicals Public Company Limited was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

7BP.F.summary: Bangchak Corporation Public Company Limited, an energy company, engages in the refining and marketing of petroleum products. It operates through Refinery and Oil Trading, Marketing, Electricity, Bio-Based Product, Natural Resource, and Other segments. The company explores and produces petroleum, biodiesel, and ethanol; produces electricity through solar, wind, and geothermal; mines lithium; and operates service stations. The company markets its oil products to various sectors, including transportation, aviation, shipping, construction, industrial, and agriculture sectors through oil traders. It operates in Thailand, Malaysia, Japan, Korea, the Philippines, Singapore, Indonesia, Norway, and internationally. The company was formerly known as The Bangchak Petroleum Public Company Limited and changed its name to Bangchak Corporation Public Company Limited in April 2017. Bangchak Corporation Public Company Limited was founded in 1984 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

7BP1.SG.summary: Bangchak Corporation Public Company Limited, an energy company, engages in the refining and marketing of petroleum products. 7LA.SG.short_name: Lanna Resources, The PCL Reg. S
7LA.SG.summary: Lanna Resources Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes lignite in Thailand and internationally. It operates through three segments: Domestic Coal, Overseas Coal, and Ethanol. It also purchases and sells coal; produces and sells coal and ethanol; and generates and distributes power. The company was founded in 1985 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

AGE-R.BK.long_name: Asia Green Energy Public Company Limited
AGE-R.BK.summary: Asia Green Energy Public Company Limited engages in the distribution of coal for industrial use in Thailand. It also provides transportation and management, water transportation and port, and cargo services, as well as consultancy services for coal extraction and water transportation. In addition, the company generates and supplies electricity; and distributes fuel. It also imports and exports coal. It serves power plants, steel plants, cement plants, and paper factories; and industrial factories relating to textile, food, rubber, and alternative energy products. The company exports coal to China, India, Vietnam, and Taiwan. Asia Green Energy Public Company Limited was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

BANPU-R.BK.summary: Banpu Public Company Limited engages in the coal mining and power businesses. The company holds an interest in a 1,434 MW coal-fired power plant in Map Ta Phut Industrial Estate, Rayong Province, Thailand. It also manages five coal mines in Kalimantan comprising Indominco, Jorong, Kitadin-Embalut, Trubaindo, and Bharinto, which produce a range of bituminous and sub-bituminous thermal coals in Indonesia. In addition, the company operates the Gaohe underground mine in Shanxi Province and Hebi mine in Henan Province; and operates and manages three combined heat and power plants with a capacity of 248 megawatts and a steam capacity of 808 tonnes per hour in northern China. Further, it owns nine underground and open-pit coal mines, which supplies thermal and coking coal located in the north and the west of New South Wales, Australia. Additionally, it engages in coal exploration and mine development of approximately 15 sites of thermal and coking coal deposits in Mongolia. The company also involved in the power and steam production, purchase, and trading business; provident fund management; solar power generation; logistics; sales and marketing activities; natural gas business; investment in power and renewable energy; and research and development business. It also provides mining, and coal mining and business consultancy services, as well as services to support coal and power business in Vietnam. The company was formerly known as Ban Pu Coal Company Limited and changed its name to Banpu Public Company Limited in July 1993. Banpu Public Company Limited was founded in 1983 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

DU4.SI.summary: Mermaid Maritime Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, provides subsea and drilling services to the offshore oil and gas industries in Saudi Arabia, Qatar, Thailand, Indonesia, Malaysia, and internationally. The company operates through two segments, Subsea Group and Holding. It provides subsea services, including inspection, repair and maintenance, infrastructure installation support, remotely operated vehicle (ROV) support, and cable and flexible pipe laying services through operating 7 subsea vessels, 17 saturation and air diving systems, and 13 ROV systems. The company also offers offshore drilling and accommodation rig services through its ownership in 1 tender assist drilling rig, 1 accommodation barge, and 3 high specification premium jack-up drilling rigs. In addition, it engages in the provision of hydrographic survey and positioning services; diving, ROV, and subsea contracting services; and production and exploration drilling services, as well as in the offshore transportation, installation, and decommissioning business. The company was founded in 1983 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. Mermaid Maritime Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Thoresen Thai Agencies Public Company Limited.

ESSO-R.BK.summary: Esso (Thailand) Public Company Limited refines and markets petroleum products in Thailand and internationally. It operates in two segments, Downstream and Petrochemicals. The company provides refined petroleum products, including motor gasoline, gasohol, diesel, aviation fuels, fuel oil, marine fuels, and LPG products; and other petroleum products comprising mineral and synthetic lubricants under the Mobil brand name, as well as asphalt. It offers its refined petroleum products through a retail network of 654 retail service stations under the Esso brand name; and commercial channel consists of sales to industrial end users and wholesalers, as well as to customers in the aviation and marine industries. The company also produces aromatics in the form of Paraxylene, a feedstock for purified terephthalic acid, as well as used as raw material for producing polyester films, packaging resins, and fabrics. In addition, it provides hydrocarbon solvents, such as hexane, which is used primarily in edible oil seed extractions and as a carrier in petrochemical production; rubber solvents that are used as adhesives and rubber cement for use in the manufacture of tires; white spirits for coating and paint industries; and Exxsol D80 for household, industrial, and metal working applications. Further, the company imports and markets aromatic solvents that are used in the automotive paint coating industry; and sells plasticizer for various applications. Additionally, it leases real estate properties. The company was formerly known as Esso Standard Thailand Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Esso (Thailand) Public Company Limited in 1996. The company was founded in 1894 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. Esso (Thailand) Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of ExxonMobil Asia Holding Private Limited.

ESSO.BK.summary: Esso (Thailand) Public Company Limited refines and markets petroleum products in Thailand and internationally. It operates in two segments, Downstream and Petrochemicals. The company provides refined petroleum products, including motor gasoline, gasohol, diesel, aviation fuels, fuel oil, marine fuels, and LPG products; and other petroleum products comprising mineral and synthetic lubricants under the Mobil brand name, as well as asphalt. The company was founded in 1894 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. Esso (Thailand) Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of ExxonMobil Asia Holding Private Limited.

IRPC-R.BK.summary: IRPC Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, provides petroleum and petrochemical products in Thailand, Singapore, and internationally. The company operates through Petroleum Products, Petrochemical Products, and Other Business segments. Its petroleum products include refined oil comprising liquefied petroleum gas, naphtha, gasoline, diesel, and fuel oil; and lube base oil and asphalt. The company's petrochemical products comprise olefins, such as ethylene, propylene, and butadiene; aromatics comprising benzene, toluene, and xylene; polymers consisting of high-density polyethylene, polypropylene, acrylonitrile-butadiene-styrene, acrylonitrile styrene, polystyrene, and expandable polystyrene; and polyols. It also provides electricity, steam, and infrastructure, including wastewater treatment and other related services; wastewater treatment for industrial customers; port and tank services; and other business services. In addition, the company also offers tugboats, pilots, service boats, mooring, freshwater, bunkers, nautical charts, cranes, hopper cars, weighing, cargo yards, and warehouse services; and tank storage services, as well as operates liquid and chemical, and bulk and container terminals. Further, it offers asset management services in Rayong and other provinces; and various support services, as well as engages in the power plant, jetty, and other utilities operations. Additionally, the company manufactures and distributes plastic resins, as well as chemical products for polyurethanes; operates vocational schools; distributes petrochemical products; and provision of oil vessel renting services. The company was formerly known as Thai Petrochemical Industry Public Company Limited and changed its name to IRPC Public Company Limited in October 2006. IRPC Public Company Limited was incorporated in 1978 and is headquartered in Rayong, Thailand.

IRPC.BK.summary: IRPC Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, provides petroleum and petrochemical products in Thailand, Singapore, and internationally. LQZ.F.summary: Thai Oil Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in oil refining and distribution business in Thailand and internationally. It operates through Oil Refinery, Lube Base Oil Refinery, Petrochemical, Power Generation, Marine Transportation Services, Solvent, Ethanol, and Other segments. The company produces gasoline, diesel/gas oil, jet fuel, kerosene, fuel oil, and liquefied petroleum gas; and petrochemical products, such as paraxylene, benzene, toluene, and mixed xylenes. It also produces and distributes lube base oil, bitumen/asphalt, and other by-products, as well as special products, such as treated distillate aromatics extract and slack wax; and hydrocarbon and chemical solvents, and other chemicals. In addition, the company operates natural gas-fired combined-cycle co-generation power plants that generate and sell electricity, steam, and utilities to industrial users, as well as invests in other power generating companies and related business. Further, it is involved in the marine transportation of petroleum and petrochemical products; production of ethanol; and provision of crew boat services. Additionally, the company offers human resource management services; and manufactures and sells linear alkyl benzene and related products. Thai Oil Public Company Limited was founded in 1961 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

NVAL.F.long_name: PTT Exploration and Production Public Company Limited
NVAL.F.summary: PTT Exploration and Production Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the exploration and production of petroleum in Thailand and internationally. It is also involved in gas pipeline transportation business; investment funding; the provision of petroleum technology; and the provision of petroleum products, such as natural gas, crude oil, condensate, naphtha and liquefied petroleum gas. The company was founded in 1985 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. PTT Exploration and Production Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of PTT Public Company Limited.

NVPF.F.summary: IRPC Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, provides petroleum and petrochemical products in Thailand, Singapore, and internationally. The company operates through Petroleum Products, Petrochemical Products, and Other Business segments. PEXNY.long_name: PTT Exploration and Production Public Company Limited
PEXNY.summary: PTT Exploration and Production Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the exploration and production of petroleum in Thailand and internationally. It is also involved in gas pipeline transportation business; investment funding; the provision of petroleum technology; and the provision of petroleum products, such as natural gas, crude oil, condensate, naphtha and liquefied petroleum gas. The company was founded in 1985 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. PTT Exploration and Production Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of PTT Public Company Limited.

PRM-R.BK.summary: Prima Marine Public Company Limited engages in the marine transportation of petroleum products and accommodation work barges in Thailand and Singapore. The company engages in the transportation and storage of crude oil, petroleum products, semi-petroleum products, and liquefied petroleum products; transportation of chemical products; and provision of oil tankers, floating storage and offloading units, and anchor handling tugs to support offshore petroleum exploration and production. It also offers recruitment and ship management services. The company was incorporated in 2007 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. Prima Marine Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Nathalin Co., Ltd.

PSTC-R.BK.long_name: Power Solution Technologies Public Company Limited
PSTC-R.BK.summary: Power Solution Technologies Public Company Limited primarily distributes and installs various types of power control and power backup systems in Thailand. It operates through Power Control System and Power Backup System; Electricity Generating from Solar Power; Petroleum Distribution and Logistics; and Construction segments. The company is also involved in the production and distribution of electricity using solar, wind, biological, biomass, and municipal solid waste, as well as alternative power resources; construction of power plants; and invests in other companies. In addition, it engages in the distribution of petroleum and logistics of fuel through a pipeline transport system; and operation of gas stations. The company was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

PSTC.BK.long_name: Power Solution Technologies Public Company Limited
PSTC.BK.summary: Power Solution Technologies Public Company Limited primarily distributes and installs various types of power control and power backup systems in Thailand. It operates through Power Control System and Power Backup System; Electricity Generating from Solar Power; Petroleum Distribution and Logistics; and Construction segments. The company is also involved in the production and distribution of electricity using solar, wind, biological, biomass, and municipal solid waste, as well as alternative power resources; construction of power plants; and invests in other companies. In addition, it engages in the distribution of petroleum and logistics of fuel through a pipeline transport system; and operation of gas stations. The company was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

PTOG.F.summary: PTT Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the upstream and downstream petroleum, natural gas, and other related businesses in Thailand, other Asian countries, Europe, the United States, and internationally. It operates through Upstream Petroleum and Natural Gas Business Group, Downstream Petroleum Business Group, and Technology and Engineering Group segments. The company engages in the exploration and production of petroleum; and natural gas procurement, pipeline transmission, distribution, and separation activities. In addition, it is involved in the exploration, production, and distribution of coal; marketing of petroleum products and lube oil through an operating system of procurement, storage, and distribution of products, as well as the retail business at service stations. Further, it imports and exports petroleum and petrochemical products, as well as other related products; and produces and distributes electricity, steam, and water for industrial purpose, as well as offers project management services. Additionally, the company provides human resource support, petroleum related technology, consultant management, technical consultant, petrol station and convenience store management, factory maintenance and engineering, oil and gas, safety and environmental, and business services, as well as services for the storage and handling of liquid chemicals. It also invests in liquefied natural gas business; produces and distributes chilled water/constructs and installs electricity generating systems; develops electricity power production projects; invests in other companies; develops, markets, and distributes polymers products, by products, and other polymers-related products; and manufactures and distributes biochemical products, as well as engages in transportation, warehouse, and bagging packing management of polyethylene. PTT Public Company Limited was founded in 1978 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

PTT-R.BK.summary: PTT Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the upstream and downstream petroleum, natural gas, and other related businesses in Thailand, other Asian countries, Europe, the United States, and internationally. It operates through Upstream Petroleum and Natural Gas Business Group, Downstream Petroleum Business Group, and Technology and Engineering Group segments. It also invests in liquefied natural gas business; produces and distributes chilled water/constructs and installs electricity generating systems; develops electricity power production projects; invests in other companies; develops, markets, and distributes polymers products, by products, and other polymers-related products; and manufactures and distributes biochemical products, as well as engages in transportation, warehouse, and bagging packing management of polyethylene. PTT Public Company Limited was founded in 1978 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

PTTEP-R.BK.long_name: PTT Exploration and Production Public Company Limited
PTTEP-R.BK.summary: PTT Exploration and Production Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the exploration and production of petroleum in Thailand and internationally. It is also involved in gas pipeline transportation business; investment funding; the provision of petroleum technology; and the provision of petroleum products, such as natural gas, crude oil, condensate, naphtha and liquefied petroleum gas. The company was founded in 1985 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. PTT Exploration and Production Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of PTT Public Company Limited.

PTTEP.BK.long_name: PTT Exploration and Production Public Company Limited

It is also involved in gas pipeline transportation business; investment funding; the provision of petroleum technology; and the provision of petroleum products, such as natural gas, crude oil, condensate, naphtha and liquefied petroleum gas. The company was founded in 1985 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. PTT Exploration and Production Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of PTT Public Company Limited.

PTT Public Company Limited was founded in 1978 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

R4Q.F.summary: RPCG Public Company Limited, through its subsidiaries, engages in the energy and real estate businesses in Thailand. It engages in the sale of equipment, including repair and maintenance services, and construction to petroleum service stations; sale of liquefied petroleum gas through a network of gas station. The company is also involved in the manufacture and distribution of biodiesel and glycerin; and provision of systems management services. In addition, it develops, rents, and sells real estate properties. The company was formerly known as Rayong Purifier Public Company Limited and changed its name to RPCG Public Company Limited in January 2014. RPCG Public Company Limited was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

RPC-R.BK.summary: RPCG Public Company Limited, through its subsidiaries, engages in the energy and real estate businesses in Thailand. It engages in the sale of equipment, including repair and maintenance services, and construction to petroleum service stations; sale of liquefied petroleum gas through a network of gas station. The company is also involved in the manufacture and distribution of biodiesel and glycerin; and provision of systems management services. In addition, it develops, rents, and sells real estate properties. The company was formerly known as Rayong Purifier Public Company Limited and changed its name to RPCG Public Company Limited in January 2014. RPCG Public Company Limited was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

RPC.BK.summary: RPCG Public Company Limited, through its subsidiaries, engages in the energy and real estate businesses in Thailand. It engages in the sale of equipment, including repair and maintenance services, and construction to petroleum service stations; sale of liquefied petroleum gas through a network of gas station. The company is also involved in the manufacture and distribution of biodiesel and glycerin; and provision of systems management services. SEAOIL-R.BK.summary: Sea Oil Public Company Limited engages in the retail sale of fuel and lubricant oils, and related products primarily for tankers, fishery boats, and reefer vessels in Thailand, Singapore, Laos, Cambodia, Myanmar, and internationally. It offers marine fuel oil, high speed diesel oil, lubricants, and benzene. The company also provides catering and housekeeping services for oil and gas drilling crew; management services for solar power plant; generates electricity from solar power plant, and sells solar roof tops; and produces and distributes solvents and liquefied petroleum products, including white spirit, rubber solvent, diesel, and fuel oil. It serves land customers, factories, and transportation industries. The company was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

SEAOIL.BK.summary: Sea Oil Public Company Limited engages in the retail sale of fuel and lubricant oils, and related products primarily for tankers, fishery boats, and reefer vessels in Thailand, Singapore, Laos, Cambodia, Myanmar, and internationally. It offers marine fuel oil, high speed diesel oil, lubricants, and benzene. The company also provides catering and housekeeping services for oil and gas drilling crew; management services for solar power plant; generates electricity from solar power plant, and sells solar roof tops; and produces and distributes solvents and liquefied petroleum products, including white spirit, rubber solvent, diesel, and fuel oil. It serves land customers, factories, and transportation industries. The company was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

SGP-R.BK.long_name: Siamgas and Petrochemicals Public Company Limited
SGP-R.BK.summary: Siamgas and Petrochemicals Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, trades in liquefied petroleum gas (LPG) and petrochemical products in Thailand and internationally. The company operates through Petroleum and Petrochemical Products, Transportation Services, and Other segments. It is also involved in the trading of petroleum for household cooking, industry, and transportation sectors. In addition, the company provides transportation services by land and ship; manufactures and distributes LPG cylinders; and offers warehousing and storage, and oil depots and port services. The company was formerly known as VSPP Development Company Limited. Siamgas and Petrochemicals Public Company Limited was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

SGP.BK.long_name: Siamgas and Petrochemicals Public Company Limited
SGP.BK.summary: Siamgas and Petrochemicals Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, trades in liquefied petroleum gas (LPG) and petrochemical products in Thailand and internationally. The company operates through Petroleum and Petrochemical Products, Transportation Services, and Other segments. It is also involved in the trading of petroleum for household cooking, industry, and transportation sectors. In addition, the company provides transportation services by land and ship; manufactures and distributes LPG cylinders; and offers warehousing and storage, and oil depots and port services. The company was formerly known as VSPP Development Company Limited. Siamgas and Petrochemicals Public Company Limited was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

SKE-R.BK.summary: Sakol Energy Public Company Limited operates in the energy industry in Thailand. The company provides natural gas compression services to PTT Public Company Limited. It also produces and distributes electricity through a biomass plant, as well as compressed bio-methane gas; and engages in the rental of properties. The company was founded in 2009 and is headquartered in Pathum Thani, Thailand.

SKE.BK.summary: Sakol Energy Public Company Limited operates in the energy industry in Thailand. The company provides natural gas compression services to PTT Public Company Limited. It also produces and distributes electricity through a biomass plant, as well as compressed bio-methane gas; and engages in the rental of properties. The company was founded in 2009 and is headquartered in Pathum Thani, Thailand.

SPRC-R.BK.long_name: Star Petroleum Refining Public Company Limited
SPRC-R.BK.summary: Star Petroleum Refining Public Company Limited owns and operates a petroleum refinery in the Rayong Province of Thailand. It provides transportation fuels and petrochemical feedstock. The company also produces liquefied petroleum gas, polymer grade propylene, naphtha, gasoline, jet fuel, diesel, fuel oil, crude, reformate, sulfur, mixed C4, and asphalt. It exports its petroleum products to Laos, Cambodia, and Myanmar. The company was founded in 1992 and is based in Mueang Rayong, Thailand. Star Petroleum Refining Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Chevron South Asia Holdings Pte. Ltd.

SPRC.BK.long_name: Star Petroleum Refining Public Company Limited
SPRC.BK.summary: Star Petroleum Refining Public Company Limited owns and operates a petroleum refinery in the Rayong Province of Thailand. It provides transportation fuels and petrochemical feedstock. The company also produces liquefied petroleum gas, polymer grade propylene, naphtha, gasoline, jet fuel, diesel, fuel oil, crude, reformate, sulfur, mixed C4, and asphalt. It exports its petroleum products to Laos, Cambodia, and Myanmar. The company was founded in 1992 and is based in Mueang Rayong, Thailand. Star Petroleum Refining Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Chevron South Asia Holdings Pte. Ltd.

SR-R.BK.summary: Siamraj Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the construction of natural gas metering and pipeline transmission systems in Thailand. The company offers flow measuring systems and engineering services from branched natural gas pipeline to the power stations, process industrial plants, and natural gas service stations. It also engages in the design and construction of natural gas metering systems, such as gas chromatographs, flow metering elements, and flow computers and systems; and inspection, repair, and maintenance service of equipment in gas metering stations. In addition, the company owns, operates, and maintains NGV stations in Bangna; designs, supplies, and installs natural gas quality improvement systems; and develops solar energy and other alternative energy projects. Further, it provides manpower, accounting, financial, and maintenance services. Additionally, the company provides industrial pump systems, such as gear pumps, sanitary pumps, screw pumps, vacuum systems, diaphragm pumps, process metering, and process centrifugal pumps; industrial and municipal waste treatment air compressors; and gas turbines and compressors for power plants. The company was formerly known as Siamrajathanee Corporation Company Limited and changed its name to Siamraj Public Company Limited in February 2015. Siamraj Public Company Limited was founded in 1984 and is based in Samutprakarn, Thailand.

SR.BK.summary: Siamraj Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the construction of natural gas metering and pipeline transmission systems in Thailand. The company offers flow measuring systems and engineering services from branched natural gas pipeline to the power stations, process industrial plants, and natural gas service stations. It also engages in the design and construction of natural gas metering systems, such as gas chromatographs, flow metering elements, and flow computers and systems; and inspection, repair, and maintenance service of equipment in gas metering stations. Additionally, the company provides industrial pump systems, such as gear pumps, sanitary pumps, screw pumps, vacuum systems, diaphragm pumps, process metering, and process centrifugal pumps; industrial and municipal waste treatment air compressors; and gas turbines and compressors for power plants. The company was formerly known as Siamrajathanee Corporation Company Limited and changed its name to Siamraj Public Company Limited in February 2015. Siamraj Public Company Limited was founded in 1984 and is based in Samutprakarn, Thailand.

SUSCO-R.BK.summary: Susco Public Company Limited engages in the wholesale and retail of fuel products in Thailand, Cambodia, Myanmar, Laos, and China. The company sells benzene, diesel oil, gasohol, natural gas, liquefied petroleum gas, and lubricants, as well as marts. It also provides management services; leases land and service stations; and offers the right to use the trademark license. The company was formerly known as Siam United Services Public Company Limited and changed its name to Susco Public Company Limited in December 2010. Susco Public Company Limited was founded in 1977 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

SUSCO.BK.summary: Susco Public Company Limited engages in the wholesale and retail of fuel products in Thailand, Cambodia, Myanmar, Laos, and China. The company sells benzene, diesel oil, gasohol, natural gas, liquefied petroleum gas, and lubricants, as well as marts. It also provides management services; leases land and service stations; and offers the right to use the trademark license. The company was formerly known as Siam United Services Public Company Limited and changed its name to Susco Public Company Limited in December 2010. Susco Public Company Limited was founded in 1977 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

TOIPF.summary: Thai Oil Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in oil refining and distribution business in Thailand and internationally. It operates through Oil Refinery, Lube Base Oil Refinery, Petrochemical, Power Generation, Marine Transportation Services, Solvent, Ethanol, and Other segments. The company produces gasoline, diesel/gas oil, jet fuel, kerosene, fuel oil, and liquefied petroleum gas; and petrochemical products, such as paraxylene, benzene, toluene, and mixed xylenes. It also produces and distributes lube base oil, bitumen/asphalt, and other by-products, as well as special products, such as treated distillate aromatics extract and slack wax; and hydrocarbon and chemical solvents, and other chemicals. In addition, the company operates natural gas-fired combined-cycle co-generation power plants that generate and sell electricity, steam, and utilities to industrial users, as well as invests in other power generating companies and related business. Further, it is involved in the marine transportation of petroleum and petrochemical products; production of ethanol; and provision of crew boat services. Additionally, the company offers human resource management services; and manufactures and sells linear alkyl benzene and related products. Thai Oil Public Company Limited was founded in 1961 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

TOP-R.BK.summary: Thai Oil Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in oil refining and distribution business in Thailand and internationally. It operates through Oil Refinery, Lube Base Oil Refinery, Petrochemical, Power Generation, Marine Transportation Services, Solvent, Ethanol, and Other segments. The company produces gasoline, diesel/gas oil, jet fuel, kerosene, fuel oil, and liquefied petroleum gas; and petrochemical products, such as paraxylene, benzene, toluene, and mixed xylenes. It also produces and distributes lube base oil, bitumen/asphalt, and other by-products, as well as special products, such as treated distillate aromatics extract and slack wax; and hydrocarbon and chemical solvents, and other chemicals. In addition, the company operates natural gas-fired combined-cycle co-generation power plants that generate and sell electricity, steam, and utilities to industrial users, as well as invests in other power generating companies and related business. Further, it is involved in the marine transportation of petroleum and petrochemical products; production of ethanol; and provision of crew boat services. Additionally, the company offers human resource management services; and manufactures and sells linear alkyl benzene and related products. Thai Oil Public Company Limited was founded in 1961 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

TPIG.F.summary: IRPC Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, provides petroleum and petrochemical products in Thailand, Singapore, and internationally. The company operates through Petroleum Products, Petrochemical Products, and Other Business segments. Its petroleum products include refined oil comprising liquefied petroleum gas, naphtha, gasoline, diesel, and fuel oil; and lube base oil and asphalt. The company's petrochemical products comprise olefins, such as ethylene, propylene, and butadiene; aromatics comprising benzene, toluene, and xylene; polymers consisting of high-density polyethylene, polypropylene, acrylonitrile-butadiene-styrene, acrylonitrile styrene, polystyrene, and expandable polystyrene; and polyols. It also provides electricity, steam, and infrastructure, including wastewater treatment and other related services; wastewater treatment for industrial customers; port and tank services; and other business services. In addition, the company also offers tugboats, pilots, service boats, mooring, freshwater, bunkers, nautical charts, cranes, hopper cars, weighing, cargo yards, and warehouse services; and tank storage services, as well as operates liquid and chemical, and bulk and container terminals. Further, it offers asset management services in Rayong and other provinces; and various support services, as well as engages in the power plant, jetty, and other utilities operations. Additionally, the company manufactures and distributes plastic resins, as well as chemical products for polyurethanes; operates vocational schools; distributes petrochemical products; and provision of oil vessel renting services. The company was formerly known as Thai Petrochemical Industry Public Company Limited and changed its name to IRPC Public Company Limited in October 2006. IRPC Public Company Limited was incorporated in 1978 and is headquartered in Rayong, Thailand.

UMS-R.BK.long_name: Unique Mining Services Public Company Limited
UMS-R.BK.summary: Unique Mining Services Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, imports and sells coal in Thailand. The company operates in two segments, Sales of Coal and Transport. It engages in the provision of port services and transportation by barge conveyance. The company is also involved in the logistics management and trading of fertilizers; and road transportation and trading of wood pellets. It serves medium and small sized industries, such as food and beverage, pulp and paper, and textile industries. The company also focuses on generating and distributing electricity from other renewable energy, such as wind power, biomass, solar energy, and others. Unique Mining Services Public Company Limited was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. Unique Mining Services Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Athene Holdings Ltd.

UMS.BK.long_name: Unique Mining Services Public Company Limited
UMS.BK.summary: Unique Mining Services Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, imports and sells coal in Thailand. The company operates in two segments, Sales of Coal and Transport. It engages in the provision of port services and transportation by barge conveyance. The company is also involved in the logistics management and trading of fertilizers; and road transportation and trading of wood pellets. It serves medium and small sized industries, such as food and beverage, pulp and paper, and textile industries. The company also focuses on generating and distributing electricity from other renewable energy, such as wind power, biomass, solar energy, and others. The company is also involved in the manufacture and distribution of biodiesel and glycerin; and provision of systems management services. In addition, it develops, rents, and sells real estate properties.
